about_the_game:
The way is dangerous and the creatures that dwell within are deadly to even the strongest armies, but the task is left to just one unarmed knight. As you venture into the deep you will encounter a race of creatures called “Optiads” which threaten to dominate all life. Be aware, these Optiads possess unnatural powers of perception and have an uncanny ruthlessness. Your mission is to eradicate these destructive creatures by taking out the king of them all!

In Hyper Bit Chasm you will encounter massive quantities of treasure at every turn which will help you on your journey. Collect coins and discover chests scattered about the world. Use your treasures to buy upgrades to discover new abilities and increase your skills.

FEATURES


Battle System: Engage in an addictive battle system that is easy to learn but hard to master. As you progress in skill you will find yourself able to continue further and achieve more exciting maneuvers every time you play!

Replicated 8-bit Graphics: The visuals are made to resemble classic NES games and uses the same color palette limited to the NES. It achieves similar graphics while enhancing the experience with modern hardware.

Chiptune Music: To further your immersion in the classic gaming experience Hyper Bit Chasm utilizes chiptune music. The soundtrack is made to mimic 8-bit music but with added modern sound technology to complement the retro style we all love!

Fresh New Levels Every Time You Play: Hyper Bit Chasm uses procedurally generated levels to give you a different experience every time you play!
